ygData.subject: RE: Mistmoore Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: it is approximately a 20% increase.  you ll notice in the long run, then you will get used to it.  try playing elemental rhythms with a normal drum and with
ygData.messageBody:
it is approximately a 20% increase. you'll notice in the long run, then you
will get used to it. try playing elemental rhythms with a normal drum and
with your mm drum and see the difference in resist increases. i think you
got a good deal as well.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
>
> Well, I purchased a MM drum yesterday, for the low price of 250pp + a
> LizardScale Cloak, negotiated down to that from 500pp, mainly I think,
> because a group was selling it and wanted a quick return.
>
> After getting it I was quite disappointed. I didn't seem to run that
> much faster, and I couldn't find a percussion song that had a
> quantifiable effect increase. Is this due to the recent patch
> issue that
> affected MM drum and selo's? Or can someone reccommend a song
> I can play
> to see the difference?
>
> Uldar Ulfangson
